header.rec_loc: At the home of ANON, High Lane, Stockport
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Care homes, food, dishes, dogs, names, care for our Grandad, Grandma’s friend ANON and her family, what to do with items after someone dies, money and inheritance, Aunty ANON , her house, her niece and great niece, extended family relations, ages of extended family, alcohol, our other grandparents, presents, grandma’s friend, family visiting ANON at university, ANON's university friends, an inside joke from weeks ago, ANON's friend at home, ANON making a joke, weddings, Gary Barlow, ANON's trip to India, remembering old jokes, TV, comedy, the walk ANON went on that day.
header.activity: Talking over a meal at Grandma’s.
header.conv_type: Discussing, Explaining, Inquiring, COmplianing, anecdote telling, telling jokes
